scripts.manual-deploy: ./node_modules/.bin/now rm bitwages -s -y || true && ./node_modules/.bin/now --public && ./node_modules/.bin/now alias && ./node_modules/.bin/now alias bitwages.now.sh -r rules.json
scripts.automatic-deploy: ./node_modules/.bin/now rm bitwages -s -y -t ${zeitToken} || true  && ./node_modules/.bin/now --public -t ${zeitToken} && ./node_modules/.bin/now alias -t ${zeitToken} && ./node_modules/.bin/now alias bitwages.now.sh -r rules.json -t ${zeitToken}
